definition: soft candy (gummi candy, gumdrop, jellybean etc)

sentences.english: She ordered gummi bears and a knife a couple hours ago.
sentences.chinese: 几小时前预定了一些小熊软糖和一把刀。

sentences.english: Marshmallow Peeps are America's favorite non-chocolate Easter candies.
sentences.chinese: 果浆软糖是美国最喜欢的非巧克力复活节糖果。

sentences.english: I allowed an inch overage, which still looks fine and leaves a little fudge room.
sentences.chinese: 我允许英寸盘盈，仍然看起来很好，叶一间小软糖。

sentences.english: And don’t skimp on the fantasy hot fudge.
sentences.chinese: 还有千万不要吝啬对热软糖的幻想。

sentences.english: Gelatin gum is an acid candy made by gelatin as main colloid ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 橡皮糖是一类以明胶为主要胶体的含酸切香型软糖。

sentences.english: Creative vanilla cake with buttercream frosting and fondant.
sentences.chinese: 西装造型的香草味蛋糕，有奶油乳酪和软糖哦。

sentences.english: The alien is hand molded out of fondant and is completely edible.
sentences.chinese: 外国人手工成型的软糖，并且完全可食用。

sentences.english: After finishing the questionnaire at the computer, the students were told they could take some jellybeans.
sentences.chinese: 完成了电脑问卷后，学生们被告知他们可以吃点软糖。

sentences.english: Then, compound functional gum-sweets that contained vitamin E and organic selenium was produced.
sentences.chinese: 同时研发了含有维生素E和有机硒的复合功能性软糖。

sentences.english: The coat covering the soft candies is made from glutinous rice.
sentences.chinese: 包裹软糖的江米纸是由糯米做成的。

sentences.english: Give me Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Fudge Brownie any day.
sentences.chinese: 本杰里给我的巧克力软糖布朗尼任何一天。

sentences.english: In fact, there may be a 3-tiers fondant covered dummy cakes following me home tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，那可能是3层软糖大量的蛋糕模型跟我回家。
